meanings.sent1: She felt unsure about her decision to change careers.
meanings.sent2: He seemed unsure about the directions to the new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The unsure puppy cautiously approached the unfamiliar toy.
meanings.sent4: Her unsure smile revealed her nervousness during the interview.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds overhead made her feel even more unsure about the outdoor event.

meanings.sent1: The unsure student hesitated before answering the question.
meanings.sent2: He had an unsure expression as he tried to fix the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The unsure kitten tentatively pounced on the moving shadow.
meanings.sent4: Her unsure voice cracked as she spoke in front of the large audience.
meanings.sent5: The flickering candlelight cast an unsure glow on the dim room.
